Description:
2 bedrooms make this the areas best buy!
Walk to the shops & Ormond station - when you choose this exciting entry to leafy Lillimur, it's all in front of you. Set to the front on the first-floor to ensure privacy, this well-presented 2 bedroom apartment has been polished up with glossy hardwood timber floors, features r/c air conditioning, cosied up with a warm solid-timber kitchen & opened up with wide windows from each bedroom onto the tree-lined street outside. With carport parking secured behind auto gates adding peace of mind, & a great location just off the Ormond shopping strip & just two blocks to the station adding easy amenity, this up-front, up-high apartment is the perfect start-up or genuinely smart investment.
2 bedrooms with robes
Neat bathroom
Solid-timber kitchen
Polished boards
Reverve cycle aircon,
Carport secured behind an auto-gate,
5 minute walk to the station, 1 block to the shops
Insights: 7/27 Lillimur Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Location in the Mckinnon Zone
Ideally designed for first homebuyers, downsizers or investors, secure this spacious, two bedroom, two bathroom ground floor apartment in a location to love.
Cleverly configured with multiple living zones offering an open lounge area blending effortlessly with a technika appliance kitchen and casual meals area, which flows out to a private courtyard with excellent emphasis on outdoor entertaining. Zoned accommodation provides 2 bedrooms including a stylish ensuite for one of the bedrooms, with a separate fully tiled bathroom concealing a euro laundry.
Enjoy a low maintenance, easy care lifestyle in the Mckinnon Secondary School zone with the comforts of reverse-cycle air-conditioning, panel heating, audio intercom secure entry and basement parking, situated right on the edge of Ormond's cosmopolitan shopping strip, just metres from the train station with direct links to the city and minutes to Chadstone's shopping.
Insights: 5/498 North Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Start up or Scale down with Contemporary Quality
Tucked away at the rear of a peaceful precinct, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom ground floor apartment lays the foundation for the future in first home buyers or astute investors on the fringe of Ormond's shopping district. Stainless steel appliance kitchen with granite benches aligned with open plan living and dining upon entry, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, a fully tiled central bathroom and a private courtyard. Split system heating and cooling, polished timber floors, a hideaway washing machine, an undercover parking space and a security entrance are among the coveted features this apartment yields, offering easy commuting with major road access to the CBD and Ormond train station in sight, opposite Kilvington Grammar School, around the corner from E.E Gunn reserve and buses with direct links to Universities.

Description:
Location & lifestyle will impress
While the design of this townhouse is urban chic, the lifestyle it offers is peaceful, low maintenance and relaxing. It is the perfect blend of form and function. The spacious open plan living room (A/C) flows into a stylish eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Upstairs, there are two bedrooms (with built-in wardrobes) that have their own access to the shared bathroom. The shady rear courtyard is partly paved and provides plenty of alfresco entertaining space in a private environment. Among the inclusions - powder room, Euro laundry, ducted heating, and garage with direct entry to the house. Street-front and on its own title, this home earns even more acclaim for its location in walking distance to Ormond shops, cafes and train station and to parks, reserves, recreation, buses and schools.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
Nest or invest with success - Auction this Saturday at 10am
Boasting natural light from its favoured northern orientation, this first floor apartment ticks all the boxes for those searching for their first home or as an addition to their property portfolio. Enjoying two double bedrooms, each with built in robes, large living room with north facing balcony and leafy outlook, modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher plus a tiled bathroom. Additional features include split system heating/cooling, security gates, intercom entry and carport. Close to Ormond Station, shops and Tennis Club.

Description:
Charming Period Home in Mckinnon School Zone
Perfect weatherboard facade, magnificent low maintenance, stylishly designed 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home offers beautifully bright interiors, private garden spaces and superb lifestyle advantages.
Stylish, light filled sanctuary, retaining its period allure including timber floors, original cast iron fireplaces (one with gas fire), gorgeous lead light windows and ornate high ceilings. Recently renovated kitchen with new dishwasher, and stunning new dual access ensuite bathroom. Meals can be enjoyed in the lounge/dining room or the outdoor entertaining area overlooking the back garden. There are two car spaces for off street parking with remote roller door access.
The location can't be better with Ormond train station and local shops at the end of the street, a walk to McKinnon Village, along with Joyce Park a short stroll away. The home is also in the prized McKinnon Secondary College zone. Either live in or rent out with ease, or take your time to plan your next move for this rare Ormond offering.
Insights: 1 Oakleigh Crescent, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Sleek Stylish Urban Living with Courtyard Flair
Get chic on the ground floor in this designer 2 bedroom 1.5 bathroom security apartment.
Soaking up the north sun, this private hideaway features a fully tiled open plan living & dining area with fabulous stone kitchen (stainless steel appliances) opening to a sun drenched courtyard garden; 2 double bedrooms (BIRs, main opening to an alfresco area), stylish bathroom with stone benchtops, powder room (2nd toilet) and a European laundry.
Easy living with cosmopolitan style, this great starter or investment boasts R/C air conditioning, video intercom and security basement parking with large storage cage.
A heartbeat to North Road shops, cafes and restaurants, as well as a hip bar culture, the Frankston line train, Monash Uni bus and gorgeous parks.

Description:
Well positioned 1-bedroom apartment
Get your foot in the property market with this great starter home or investment property. Situated on the 1st floor of a neat and trim block, the bright, open apartment offers a sunny living room, and a bright refurbished kitchen that has that sleek modern look with plenty of cupboards and drawers. The bedroom has a built-in wardrobe, and the bathroom, with laundry facilities, has been modernised also and now has swish, low maintenance, floor-to-ceiling tiles. The apartment comes with a carport, and the location is in walking distance to Ormond shops, cafes and trains, close to the bus direct to Monash University, and near parks and leisure facilities.

Description:
A Rare Blend of Style and Location
This sophisticated apartment entices with its enviable location and luxury appointments. Spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen feature tiled floors and balcony access. The kitchen is complimented by sleek tiled splash backs, stainless steel appliances and Caesarstone benchtops. Two generous bedrooms boast carpets, mirrored built-in-robes, slim line blinds and exterior privacy screens. Further comforts include a modern, sparkling bathroom and powder, reverse cycle heating and cooling, European laundry, linen storage, basement car space with storage cage and video intercom entry. Located superbly amongst shops, cafe culture, schools and public transport. This near new apartment is not to be missed!

Description:
Spectacular Home in the McKinnon Sec Zone
Beautifully presented from front to back, in a prime residential locale, this four bedroom two bathroom family residence sets the standard for quality family living. Spacious and detailed with high-end features, this magnificent light-filled home offers exceptional living areas with a traditional lounge at the front producing an open fireplace and leadlight, which flows into a formal dining area with a floor to ceiling bay window. A vast formal living room showcases a captivating kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dropside spotted gum island benchtop, connecting a vast family area enhanced by a stunning cathedral ceiling, soaring high above a French balconied mezzanine level sanctuary.
Family oriented with 4 robed bedrooms includes a glass-topped vanity for the ensuite, a big study (with option for a fifth bedroom), and a central fully tiled bathroom.
An entertainer's backyard welcomes a broad decking with outdoor dining set above a solar heated pool and ornamental vines adorning an undercover alfresco with immaculate gardens surrounding. Enjoy a pleasant lifestyle with all the extras including a laundry, shed, carport, and the comforts of ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote control gates and easy access roof storage. Located in the illustrious McKinnon Secondary school zone with McKinnon Primary around the corner, metres to North road shops, a walk to Ormond train station and the bus for commuting to Chadstone and Southland shopping Centers. Land size 670 sqm approx (Frontage 16.75m approx). Future development potential (STCA),

Description:
In Zone Surprise Package!
Think you've seen it all in the Zone? Wait until you see the surprise in store here! More than just accommodating, more than just in the McKinnon College Zone, this three bedroom, two bathroom rear home goes above and beyond with expansive lounge and dining areas plus a "surprise" first-floor adding a second living zone and fitted study! But the living doesn't end there ...with a paved courtyard transformed into an al fresco area by two vast auto-awnings!
Cleverly zoned with bedrooms in a quiet wing including master with an elegant ensuite and wonderful WIR, this remarkable rear home is appointed to an outstanding standard with a Miele dishwasher for the Stone and prestige appliance kitchen, robes for most bedrooms and ducted heating, cooling and vacuum throughout!
With auto-shutters for added peace of mind and a double auto-garage for added car accommodation, even the location is full of surprises -a walk to Ormond strip and station and a few blocks to the back gates of McKinnon College!

Description:
Auction this Saturday 5th September at 11.00am
Make an impressive entry or down-size without compromise, Zone in on sizeable single-level living on the streetfront! Scaled up to offer an ultra-accommodating four bedroom, two bathroom, dual living floorplan, this streetfront home capitalises on an off-the-strip, transport precinct College Zone address with more space, more extras and more amenities within a walk!
Make your entry to family-sized College Zone living with a bedroom for all the kids, a master-suite for parental privacy and choice of space to stretch out in a vast lounge zone or to see the light in a sun-filled north-facing casual or dining area. Alternatively, enjoy a super-sized empty-nest with sizeable accommodation and great extras including a timeless kitchen, a fully-tiled spa-bathroom and a private ensuite. With built-in robes for most bedrooms and a WIR for the master, this prestige appointed home is centrally heated, air-conditioned and alarmed with intercom and ducted vacuum.
With a picket-fenced garden out front, a paved entertainer's courtyard to the side and an auto-garage under the roofline, there's something for everyone in this sizeable streetfront home ...including a high-amenity position within a walk of the station, a stroll of the shopping and restaurant strip and a lazy wander of the back gates of McKinnon College!

Description:
The Full McKinnon Zone Family Package
The full family package filled with prestige extras and set on its own full-sized approx 584sqm block, this is the full McKinnon College Zone family package! Showcasing an architect-designed extension featuring family-wise triple zone living, this 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom home stars a traditional formal lounge with stone-fronted fireplace, expansive north-facing family living opening to a covered al fresco area, and a versatile first-floor retreat with room for work or play.
Innovatively designed with a choice of vast master-suite upstairs or down (one with balcony, one with bay-window, both with WIRs and ensuites), this distinctive home is architecturally detailed with a soaring entry void, tall windows bracketing for the DeLonghi and granite kitchen and a lofty mezzanine-style first-floor hallway. Appointed with all the extras including reverse-cycle air-conditioners, ducted heating and vacuum and an alarm, there's plenty of room for kids to play in sunny northerly landscaped gardens and plentiful parking (with room for at least four cars) on a semi-circle driveway and carport.
Even the location is full of benefits - just two blocks from the back gates of the Secondary College, an easy walk to McKinnon Primary School and a stroll to local shopping and McKinnon Reserve!

Description:
"Arkaroola" divine McKinnon Hill family entertainer in the zone
"Arkaroola" is a divine 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom period home that epitomises family living in its 725sqm approx grounds. Light & inviting, high ceilings and charming features of the era will captivate you. Keep an eye on children splashing in the salt chlorinated pool or playing in the yard, while enjoying the open living and dining spaces, immersed in natural light from feature full-length windows. Love the formal, cosy sitting room with its open fireplace and your beautiful kitchen is fitted with Smeg stainless steel appliances & stone benchtops.
Also feat. 2100L water storage, solar pool heating, an auto timed sprinkler system, ducted heating, air conditioning, ample storage throughout with BIR in the front bedrooms & substantial attic storage, off street parking for 3 cars (inc. a lock up garage at the rear) and an established garden that is a joy to tend. In zone for the coveted McKinnon Sec. College & Ormond Primary, with Allnutt Park, McKinnon & Ormond shopping villages and trains station are all close by. Perhaps perfect for a dual occupancy site, or extend up & enjoy potential views to the city and the bay (all STCA), in one of the finest and most sought after streets in the district.

Description:
Big boutique apartment on the strip
Step down the lane opposite the station, step in off the strip, discover the big benefits of life in a small development! One of just three apartments in this boutique on-the-strip group (and one of just two in this section), this super-sized two bedroom, dual living home offers 110sqm approx of sun-filled living!
Opening up with a versatile formal area (perfect as home-office, but big enough to be a TV lounge), this expansive apartment stretches back to with an airy open plan offering defined living spaces & separate dining or study and a wall of north-facing bi-folds to a well-screened balcony. Clever accommodating with two big robe-fitted double bedrooms separated by a super-sized bathroom (with separate shower and bath) , this quality apartment is big on extras too with a prestige Blanco appliance kitchen, a thick waterfall-edge stone benchtops, parquetry-style floors and great storage including a WIR.
With climate-controlling reverse-cycle air-conditioning and the security of intercom entry, this easy living apartment even has a large storeroom, garaging and access to plentiful visitor parking at the door. Live the commuter life on this fast transforming shopping and restaurant strip, invest at the heart of this lifestyle location, or make this your lock-and-leave base for your downsizer life. Whatever the plan, this big boutique apartment is a sizeable opportunity.
Insights: 49 other 2 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Start!
Situated in the heart of the Ormond precinct and set-back off Grange Road, this solid brick, light-filled 1 bedroom apartment offers endless opportunity! Only one of eight on the block with a car-space on title, the homely residence offers gas heating, parquetry flooring, ample storage space and a massive bathroom with endless scope to improve. Whether the plan was to reside or invest, the choice is yours! In close proximity to Ormond Station, North Road Shops, Cafes, Restaurants, Parks (Joyce Park & E E Gunn Reserve, J T Packer Park) & Chadstone Shopping Centre.

Description:
A high quality renovation & a top location
Wow! A high quality renovation and much more space than you'd expect in a one-bedroom apartment has created a chic contemporary home in the heart of Ormond. On the ground-floor of the block, this apartment is full of surprises. Hard-wearing bamboo flooring is the first noticeable style statement. It is a feature of the spacious open living room where a superior kitchen has stone benchtops, new Bosch cooker with gas hotplates, an integrated single-drawer dishwasher, and glossy cabinetry. The double bedroom (ceiling fan) has mirror-fronted BIRs and a bright fully tiled bathroom/ensuite with laundry facilities. A private rear courtyard is the icing on the cake! Security is an additional feature, with remote-controlled gates to the carport, and intercom entry to the apartment. Whip around the corner to the train station and buses in the Ormond shopping centre. Be in the CBD or at Monash Uni (Caulfield) in a flash. Relish the close proximity to cafes, recreation and reserves. Love the lifestyle this apartment offers!
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
A sanctuary of style & quality
Another successful marketing campaign by Team Newbond at Woodards Carnegie - considering selling call Cedric 0418 326 174 or Maria 0407 359 676 for exceptional service:
Architect-designed, master craftsmen-built and with an interior conceived by an award winning designer, this beautiful modern home is a reflection of the skill, love and care lavished upon it. It is the front of 2 on the block, with a real sense of privacy and peacefulness. Gleaming hardwood flooring and extensive glazing enhanced by superb presentation and an open, spacious, fresh, natural light-drenched interior make this residence shine. The L-shape lounge-dining room has door out to a deck and the pretty front garden. A chic kitchen (with Asko appliances) is open to the family room, leading to a private decked area. The master bedroom (WIR; shared access to a bathroom) is on the ground floor, zoned apart from 3 upstairs bedrooms (BIRs) which have pitched ceilings and are serviced by a large bathroom. Ducted heating and a double garage (automatic door) are among the inclusions. This prestigious property is in a prime pocket of Ormond with convenient access to the best Ormond, Carnegie and Glen Huntly offer.
Cedric Newbond : 0418 326 174
